channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’ve Seen the Biden-Trump Rematch Before, and It Was Scary
item.description: Russia’s election in 1996 is a cautionary tale for America.

item.title: Monday Briefing
item.description: We’re covering a Ukrainian warning of a new Russian offensive as well as a Hamas strike on Israel.

item.title: EU would 'be delighted' to forge closer ties with the U.K.'s next government, according to Economy Commissioner
item.description: While Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has edged the U.K. closer to the EU and helped normalize relations with the bloc, Labour has vowed to further improve ties if it wins.

item.title: How China Pulled So Far Ahead on Industrial Policy
item.description: The United States and Europe are trying to catch up to a rival skilled in using all the levers of government and banking to dominate global manufacturing.

item.title: The Deadly Prelude to South Africa’s First Free Elections
item.description: The vote in 1994 was a time of hope — but in the weeks before, the country came close to the abyss. A photographer remembers what he witnessed.

item.title: Women are now less likely to be in top earning 1% of U.K. finance and professional services jobs than before the pandemic
item.description: There's been progress, but the more senior you get, the greater the gender gap.

item.title: The Deadly Prelude to South Africa’s First Free Elections
item.description: The vote in 1994 was a time of hope — but in the weeks before, the country came close to the abyss. A photographer remembers what he witnessed.

item.title: Spying Arrests Send Chill Through Britain’s Thriving Hong Kong Community
item.description: Hundreds of thousands of Hong Kongers have resettled in the U.K. since 2021, among them prominent pro-democracy activists. China has not forgotten them.

item.title: Here's how ADHD is diagnosed in adults
item.description: The disorder can present differently in children and adults.

item.title: Spying Arrests Send Chill Through Britain’s Thriving Hong Kong Community
item.description: Hundreds of thousands of Hong Kongers have resettled in the U.K. since 2021, among them prominent pro-democracy activists. China has not forgotten them.

item.title: This Island Wants to Round Up Its Wild Goats. Catching Them Won’t Be Easy.
item.description: The ruminants outnumber humans on the Mediterranean island of Alicudi 6 to 1 (maybe more). Officials have devised a plan to catch the goats and send them to adoptive homes elsewhere.

item.title: 'Bond King' Bill Gross warns Trump would worsen deficits and be 'more disruptive' for the bond market than Biden
item.description: "Trump is the more bearish of the candidates simply because his programs advocate continued tax cuts and more expensive things."

item.title: This Island Wants to Round Up Its Wild Goats. Catching Them Won’t Be Easy.
item.description: The ruminants outnumber humans on the Mediterranean island of Alicudi 6 to 1 (maybe more). Officials have devised a plan to catch the goats and send them to adoptive homes elsewhere.

item.title: Middle East Crisis: Israeli Airstrike in Rafah Kills Dozens in Tent Camp, Gazan Officials Say
item.description: The Israeli military said it carried out an attack on a Hamas compound, killing two leaders, and was investigating reports of Palestinian civilian casualties.

item.title: A flood of cheap Chinese exports is putting the entire global economy at risk, France’s finance minister warns
item.description: “We have an issue with the economic model in which China is producing more and more cheaper industrial devices because it could be a threat not only for the EU, not only for the US, but for the global world economy.”
